welcome_to_ovulu_signup: Welcome to Ovulu Sign up to get started!
welcome_to_ovulu_signin: Welcome to Ovulu Log in to get started!
enter_email_and_password_msg: Please enter email and choose password to sign up.
hi_my_name_is_jon: Hi! My name is Josie, and I'm an accredited practicing dietitian from Australia.
enter_name_error_msg: Please enter your name and then press Next.
pregnanat_or_not_screen: Are you currently pregnant, or trying to conceive?
I_provide_you: I'll provide you with some information, but you should still link in with a dietitian for a more comprehensive and specific plan.

error_msg.enter_email_and_password_msg: Please enter email and choose password to sign up.
error_msg.invalid_password_msg: Please enter at least 6 characters for password.
error_msg.select_an_option_error_msg: Please select an option and then press Next to continue.
error_msg.select_atleast_one_option_error_msg: Please select at least one option and then press Next to continue.
error_msg.height_age_activity_error_msg: Please fill in all the fields or click ‘I’d rather not say’ to continue
error_msg.no_internet: No internet access. Check your internet connection.
error_msg.login_error_msg: The email / password you entered is not correct. Please try again or click on Forgot Password link at the bottom.
error_msg.already_sign_up_error_msg: You have already signed up with that email. Please Log In instead.
error_msg.email_not_found: It looks like you haven’t used this email address to sign up yet! Create an account below to get started.
error_msg.otp_error_text1: The code you enter is incorrect. Please try again.
error_msg.available_email: Sorry that email has not been used to sign up yet. Please check the email and try again or click on the Sign Up link below.
error_msg.height_error_msg: Please enter your height in centimeters and click Next to continue
error_msg.age_error_msg: Please enter your age in years and click Next to continue
error_msg.weight_error_msg: Please enter your weight in kilogram and click Next to continue

pregnant_screen: Are you currently pregnant, or trying to conceive?
comorbidities_screen: Have you been diagnosed with any of the following?
when_was_the_first_period: When was the first day of your last period?
average_cycle: How many days is your average cycle?
enter_height_age_activity_screen: And finally, please enter your height, weight, age and activity level in the boxes below:

activity_options.option4: Hard exercise or sport 6 – 7 times a week

thanks_screen.text1: Thanks for all of that information
thanks_screen.text2: ! Click the button below to get started

nice_to_meet_you.text2: . Before we begin, I'd like to ask you a few questions. This will help me make the recommendations as appropriate for you as possible.

already_have_an_account: I already have an account. Log In
dont_have_account: I don't have an account. Sign Up
reset_email_msg: Enter your email address below and we will send you a reset link
reset_email_bottom_msg: Enter the email address you used to sign up and we’ll send you a code to reset your password.
new_password_screen: We sent a 4 digit one-time code to your email address. Please enter it below:
thanks_msg: We need to save your details so you can login from other devices. If you cannot access the web right now. Please check your internet and try again.
